modName: Ebony Valkyrie armor with cbbe tbbp
descriptionHtml:
im not a native english speaker so please be easy on me .

hello guys im aweare of the problems regarding the pauldrons on the armor valkyre corslet in the original mod, you could have the armor without pauldrons. however right now my computer is a potatoe and i can't use skyrim , when i get the means to update the mod i will, if you want to do it is actually really wasy, just  open the armor in the editor of this mod  (body slide and outfit studio)
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49015/?http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49015/?
 and just erase the pauldrons ( they have their own layer) just make shure what you are selecting are the pauldrons, erase them and then update the mesh and thats it! works in any of the files i made n_n
 

[center][size=50]Ebony valkyrie armor tbbp conversion[/size][/center]
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

[center][youtube]TfYqKx_w-cQ[/youtube][/center]

[size=20]FEATURES[/size]
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
ebony valkyrie made by comrade 1280 is a female only stand alone armor, I converted it to cbbe and added some options with tbbp, the one showed in the video is the stand alone version that adds movement just to the body, the other option adds movement on everything
its non skimpy and it actually looks like an armor and not a bikini
you don´t need to have the cbbe body for this to work because it covers everything



[size=22]WHERE TO FIND[/size]
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
it´s craftable under the ebony section you need the ebony crafting perk or just add it trough the console just type "help valkyrie"


[size=200][color=red][b]INSTALLATION[/b][/color][/size]

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[color=red][b]choose the file you like[/b][/color]

-the stand alone with "realistic movement"
-the file without tbbp
-or the file with tbbp applied to all amor
install with mo (mod organizer) or nmm (nexus mod manager)
or just drop the files on your skyrim directory

[size=22]TBBP INSTALLATION[/size]
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
-SKSE google it.
-tbbp compatible skeleton like [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/26800/?/]xpms[/url]
-[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53996/?/]hdt physics extension[/url] or [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/34713/?/]tbbp animation like this one[/url]

in those sites you will find a more detailed explanation of the skeleton, the hdt physcis extension and the tbbp animations.


[size=22]ARMOR REQUIREMENTS[/size]
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
none, the armor covers everything that means you don´t even need the cbbe body


[size=20]same result as screenshots[/size]
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
to make the armor look like in the screen shots you need to download the gold textures of [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/37487/?/]amidian born ebony retexture[/url]
and use a enb preset, the one I'm using is a tweaked [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/54390/?/]CROW enb[/url]


-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

if you liked this please endorse the creators of it [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49953/?/]ebony valkyrie[/url] they are the ones how made this armor possible.
the original armor was awesome and it has been my all time favorite because it was still an armor and it looked SEXY! but to be honest i didn't liked the unp top model body so i need to convert this to a better body mod in my opinion and if that weren't enough i added tbbp :O

OTHER TBBP CONVERSIONS

i find out that cbbe tbbp armors are quite rare and they generally don't have to much quality so if you see an armor you wold like to see with tbbp post it, and if enough people ask for the same armor or i just love it ill do what i can to convert it

KNOWN ISSUES:
the armor clips in the legs a little bit in some animations
if you use hdt some default bbp files may cause the breast to clip trough the metal piece of the chest
author: erick hendrix
